parameters.name: XFlippedIn
parameters.description: True to flip the x direction, false to not

parameters.name: YFlippedIn
parameters.description: True to flip the y direction, false to not

parameters.name: ZFlippedIn
parameters.description: True to flip the z direction, false to not

title: IModelDoc2.InsertCoordinateSystem
signature:
System.Boolean InsertCoordinateSystem( 
   System.Boolean
XFlippedIn
,
   System.Boolean
YFlippedIn
,
   System.Boolean
ZFlippedIn
)

parameters.name: XFlippedIn
parameters.description: True to flip the x direction, false to not

parameters.name: YFlippedIn
parameters.description: True to flip the y direction, false to not

parameters.name: ZFlippedIn
parameters.description: True to flip the z direction, false to not

returns: True if coordinate system is added successfully, false if not
remarks:
Make the selections using
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
with a mark of:
1 - Origin
2 - X axis
4 - Y axis
8 - Z axis
This method:
does not require all three axis to be selected. The behavior is the same as interactively creating a coordinate system. See the SOLIDWORKS Help for more information.
works in section-view mode, but not if temporary geometry that only exists in section-view mode is selected.

examples.title: Insert Coordinate System at Center of Mass (VBA)
